```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(cowplot)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
# Read in data

temp_day <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "temp_day.csv"))
mosquito_clean <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "mosquito_clean.csv"))
rodent_clean <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "rodent_clean.csv"))

temp_raw <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "TAAT_30min.csv"))
mos_raw <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "mos_pathogenresults.csv"))
rodent_raw <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "rpt_bloodtesting.csv"))

# Preview the data
```

```{r}
#Mutate rodent data so that name is consistent with other sheets (GRRRRRR)
mosquito_day <- mosquito_clean %>% 
  select(-startCollectDate) %>% 
  mutate(collectDate = as_date(endCollectDate)) %>% 
  select(-endCollectDate) 

temp_day_join <-temp_day %>% 
  rename("collectDate"= `floor_date(startDateTime, "day")`)

temp_mos_raw <-
  full_join(mosquito_day, temp_day_join) %>% 
  full_join(., rodent_clean)

```
